title: Loyalty Tier Upgraded
description: Fires when a user is upgraded to a higher loyalty tier.

programId.description: The unique identifier of the loyalty program.

previousTier.description: The tier the user was in before the upgrade.

newTier.description: The tier the user was upgraded to.

memberId.description: The unique identifier of the loyalty member.

qualifyingPoints.description: The number of qualifying points that triggered the upgrade.

qualifyingSpend.description: The qualifying spend amount that triggered the upgrade.
